question_text: A technician needs to replace a laptop's wireless card with a newer dual-band model. Which two considerations are most important?
answer_options: Whether the laptop supports UEFI Secure Boot
If the antenna connectors match the new card
If the new card supports the laptop's OS
The color of the laptop lid
Whether the card uses mini PCIe or M.2 interface
correct_answer: If the antenna connectors match the new card
Whether the card uses mini PCIe or M.2 interface
explanation: Wireless card form factor (mini PCIe vs M.2) and compatible antenna connector type must be confirmed before installation.
